name: bucketlistwithhooks
description: A React.js based demo and portfolio web app displaying a bucket list / wish list in a non-persistent CRUD (Create, Read, Update, & Delete) format.  Built with React.js, RESTful API, Hooks, React Router v 4, Bulma CSS framework, Google maps API, HTML 5, FontAwesome 5 icons, Google Fonts, JavaScript, CSS3, and a smattering of other fancy acronymns and buzz word technologies.  You get the idea!  Have fun.
author: Ryan Hunter | GitHub handle: SystemsVanguard | Web: www.ryanhunter.org | Location: Toronto ON Canada | Email: Ryan@ryanHunter.org
